trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest" /> class initiates a search operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest" /> 類別會初始化搜尋作業。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.#ctor" /> 建構函式會建立 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.#ctor" /> 建構函式會建立 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an empty request.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立空白要求。

trans-unit.source: The distinguished name of the object at which to start the search.
trans-unit.target: 要開始搜尋之物件的辨別名稱。

trans-unit.source: An LDAP search filter.
trans-unit.target: LDAP 搜尋篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchScope" /> that specifies the search scope.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchScope" /> 值，指定搜尋範圍。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the requested attributes in the result set.
trans-unit.target: 陣列，包含結果集中要求的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchScope,System.String[])" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest" /> class using the specified name, search filter, scope, and attributes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchScope,System.String[])" /> 建構函式使用指定的名稱、搜尋篩選條件、範圍和屬性，建立 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The distinguished name of the object for which to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋之物件的辨別名稱。

trans-unit.source: A DSML v2 search filter.
trans-unit.target: DSML v2 搜尋篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchScope" /> value that specifies the search scope.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchScope" /> 值，指定搜尋範圍。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchScope" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchScope" />。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the requested attributes in the result set.
trans-unit.target: 陣列，包含結果集中要求的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchScope,System.String[])" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest" /> class using the specified name, search filter, scope, and attributes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.#ctor(System.String,System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchScope,System.String[])" /> 建構函式使用指定的名稱、搜尋篩選條件、範圍和屬性，建立 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.Aliases" /> property contains one of the values of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DereferenceAlias" /> that specifies the dereference alias behavior.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.Aliases" /> 屬性 (Property) 包含可指定取值別名行為之其中一個 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DereferenceAlias" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DereferenceAlias" /> value that specifies the dereference alias behavior.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DereferenceAlias" /> 值，指定取值別名行為。

trans-unit.source: The value is not a member of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DereferenceAlias" />.
trans-unit.target: 值不是 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DereferenceAlias" /> 的成員。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.Attributes" /> property contains the attributes of the requested object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.Attributes" /> 屬性 (Property) 包含要求之物件的屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: The attributes of the requested object.
trans-unit.target: 要求之物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Set this property to <see langword="null" /> to retrieve all attributes.
trans-unit.target: 將此屬性 (Property) 設定為 <see langword="null" />，以擷取所有屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: One of the strings in <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> object is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> 物件中的其中一個字串是 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.DistinguishedName" /> property contains the distinguished name of the requested object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.DistinguishedName" /> 屬性包含要求之物件的辨別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The distinguished name of the requested object.
trans-unit.target: 要求之物件的辨別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.Filter" /> property contains the search filter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.Filter" /> 屬性，包含搜尋篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: The search filter.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: If the value is a string, this property is an LDAP search filter.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為字串，則此屬性為 LDAP 搜尋篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: If the value is an XML document, the property is a DSML v2 search filter.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為 XML 文件，則該屬性為 DSML v2 搜尋篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: Any other type throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 任何其他類型都會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The value is not a string or an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 值不是字串或 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.Scope" /> property contains one of the values of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchScope" /> that specifies the scope of the search.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.Scope" /> 屬性包含其中一個 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchScope" /> 值，可指定搜尋範圍。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchScope" /> that specifies the scope of the search.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchScope" /> 值會指定搜尋範圍。

trans-unit.source: The value is not a member of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchScope" />.
trans-unit.target: 值不是 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchScope" /> 的成員。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.SizeLimit" /> property contains the maximum number of objects returned in the search request.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.SizeLimit" /> 屬性包含搜尋要求中傳回之物件的最大數目。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of objects returned in the search request.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋要求中傳回之物件的最大數目。

trans-unit.source: The value is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 這個值小於零。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.TimeLimit" /> property contains a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object that specifies the time span allowed, if the server processes the search request.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.TimeLimit" /> 屬性包含 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 物件，可指定伺服器處理搜尋要求時允許的時間範圍。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object that specifies the time span allowed, if the server processes the search request.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 物件，可指定伺服器處理搜尋要求時允許的時間範圍。

trans-unit.source: The value is less than <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />.
trans-unit.target: 值小於 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.Zero" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.ToXmlNode(System.Xml.XmlDocument)" /> method creates an XML node from the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.ToXmlNode(System.Xml.XmlDocument)" /> 方法會從指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> 物件建立 XML 節點。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 產生 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.TypesOnly" /> property specifies whether the search returns only the attribute names and not the attribute values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest.TypesOnly" /> 屬性 (Property)，指定搜尋是否僅傳回屬性 (Attribute) 名稱，而非屬性 (Attribute) 值。

trans-unit.source: If this property is <see langword="true" />, the search returns only the attribute names.
trans-unit.target: 如果此屬性 (Property) 為 <see langword="true" />，則搜尋僅會傳回屬性 (Attribute) 名稱。

trans-unit.source: If this property is <see langword="false" />, the search returns both the attribute names and values.
trans-unit.target: 如果此屬性 (Property) 為 <see langword="false" />，則搜尋會同時傳回屬性 (Attribute) 名稱和值。
